description:
Heroine sisters and other popular characters from the sequel to this title, Demon Gaze 2, are joining the fray!

The following items are included:
Character Illustrations (set of 5)
Muse/Prim/Cassel/Lezerem/Jouvet

*After downloading the DLC, you can select the character illustrations you have obtained from the Appearance tab during character creation.
*This content is available for a limited time only.
ã€€Period: January 20, 2022 - February 16, 2022
name: Third Collaboration: Demon Gaze 2 Characters
